name: Road Fighter (itch) (SecretBasment)
description:
Through the road is a Retro-Style fast pased racing game!

Drive through posapocaliptic wastelands, jungles, and snowy-stuff-lands and avoid hitting rock, but becose world do not want you get bored, Everyone want's to murder you'r ass with rocket launchers! Well, good luck!

Moving:A nad D, or Left and right arrows!Shooting:SpaceRestartB or ESC
